short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate netflix search bar, enhanced by AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't know what to watch on Netflix? Simply use this extension and type what you desire! Such as "Horror movies with some comedy in them", and SkyNet will search through every Netflix title within seconds and find what you're looking for!
